Projects

Active robotics projects

The robots listed here are currently being worked on at Nortbotics. You can follow along, at home, and make these same robots. We will be creating documentation, and supporting blogposts around these projects - and also selling kits to make the robots easier to make on your own. Enjoy!

LiteArm Robotic Arm

Ever wanted your very own desktop robotic arm? Well so have we. The LiteArm is the first generation of a new open-source robotic arm platform...
